name: algoliasearch-extensions-bundle
description: Bundle jQuery, jQuery-ui (core, slider, sortable), Hogan, typeahead, algoliasearch and algoliasearch-helper for use in algoliasearch extensions integrations

scripts.build: browserify index.js --standalone algoliaBundle > bundle.js && cat bundle.js | uglifyjs > bundle.min.js

author: Algolia <support@algolia.com>
